resources.string: Moody, Record Your Daily Mood! Sad: 0-60%, Happy: 76-100%
You\'re having fun, exercising at home is the most appropriate thing when you\'re in a good mood! :)
You\'re having a good time, Watching a comedy movie is an activity that keeps your mood up!
Sad, isn\'t it? come on Badminton, get on your feet and get your sweat out! Don\'t forget to rest and drink water :D
Sad, isn\'t it? Let\'s go to the beach so that the brain can relax more^^
Enter a mood value between 0 to 100

App Description: Moody – Mood dan Activity Helper
 Moody is a simple app that helps users log their daily moods and provide activity recommendations based on mood percentages and activity preferences.
 Users can: Write a short diary Enter mood as a percentage (0–100%)

Choose the type of activity (Sport / Relax) The app supports 2 languages (Indonesia dan english), and can run in light and dark modes.
